title: Ayurveda doctor stabbed by homeless man outside Battaramulla super market
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A homeless man had stabbed an Ayurveda doctor to death in Battaramulla on Tuesday (26) night.
Local authorities said that words were exchanged between the Doctor and the homeless man when the letter had begged for money, while the former was exiting a supermarket in Battaramulla.
As the argument between the two heated up, the homeless man stabbed the doctor and fled the area.
